title: Fans convinced Joe Swash and Stacey Solomon are about to get engaged
text:

Joe Swash and Stacey Solomon fans are sure that the pair are about to get engaged following his heartfelt birthday message to the mum-of-three.

The pair have become the nation's favourite couple since they began dating in January 2016, and still to this day rave about each other on social media.

In an emotional snap, presenter Joe, 37, poured out his feelings and best wishes to Stacey on her 30th birthday.

The ex EastEnders star gushed: "Happy birthday my darling you are the most special woman in my life I love your smile, your laugh, and your ginormous granny pants.

(Image: Instagram)

(Image: Instagram)

"Thank you for being the best girlfriend I could wish for. Hope you’ve had a lovely weekend you deserve the world love you."

The heartwarming message has convinced fan the pair are ready to move onto the next chapter of their lives together after they welcomed their son Rex earlier this year.

Stacey, 30, also posted a sweet message to her boyfriend as a thank you for organising her birthday weekend and to tell him how much she loves him - hinting that engagement could be on the cards.

The adorable messages to each other sent fans wild, with some begging him to propose, and others saying that they are made for each other.

One fan gushed: "You two are so made for each other: you always make me smile"

While another begged: "Marry that girl", and a third quizzed: "Propose already!!"

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

Stacey branded Joe as "the best father and male role model I could ever wish for" in her cute post.

But this isn't the first time that darling Joe has gushed about his girlfriend on social media.

When Stacey found out they were expecting their first child together, Joe shared the news in a range of pictures dedicated to the Loose Women panelist.

(Image: INSTAGRAM)

He was confused by Stacey's sleeping patterns and admitted it drove him crazy, but he announced their special news on Instagram .

"Have been driving myself mad thinking that she's bored senseless of me and can't stand to be awake for longer than 10 minutes of my company...

"So you can imagine my delight to find out that she still loves me and my company very much she’s just been growing a baby.

(Image: staceysolomon/Instagram)

"I can’t begin to describe how happy we are to be able to share this wonderful news. We’ve been so blessed with 3 incredible children that we’ve had the privilege of raising and we are forever grateful to have the chance to become parents to another wonderful child.

"It’s all very overwhelming and emotional and we couldn’t be happier right now."

Baby Rex was born in May earlier this year, and Joe and Stacey are very proud parents.
description: Their fans are begging the presenter to propose to his girlfriend as they are branded 'perfect for each other'
